price: Na wɔnom ara yɛ adansefoɔ wɔ neɛ na wɔredeyɛ agyidifoɔ no.
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
